text:
I can look at that, but our RMM uses the Windows software/app listing which does
not differentiate. Anything v23.x shows as Adobe Acrobat (64-bit) or Adobe
Acrobat and only older versions show as Reader. (our fleet has a few stragglers
that have been off or not logged in to, in which case the auto-update doesn’t
trigger…) 
---- 
Steve Yates
ITS, Inc.
%40SN6PR08MB5517.namprd08.prod.outlook.com

metadata.topic: RE: Detecting whether PC has Acrobat or Reader
metadata.subject: RE: [patchmanagement] RE: Detecting whether PC has Acrobat or Reader

I can look at that, but our RMM uses the Windows software/app listing which does
not differentiate.  Anything v23.x shows as Adobe Acrobat (64-bit) or Adobe
Acrobat and only older versions show as Reader. (our fleet has a few stragglers
that have been off or not logged in to, in which case the auto-update doesn’t
